name: roast leg of lamb
description: It's a roasted leg of lamb.

name: baked salmon
description: It's some baked salmon, with a crispy skin and juicy meat.

name: elven bread
description: It's a delicately flavored bread made by the elves. It's said to have a hint of magic in every bite.

name: dragon steak
description: It's a steak from the meat of a dragon, said to have a unique and powerful flavor.

name: giant's stew
description: It's a hearty stew made from the meat of giant creatures. It's said to give strength to those who eat it.

name: unicorn roast
description: It's a roast made from the meat of a unicorn, it's said to have the power to heal and restore vitality.
